subject: Short-Track Speedskating
Olympic Games (2014)
Bobsledding
lead_paragraph: Li Jianrou of China won the 500-meter short-track speedskating gold in a wild final race. The victory kept the Olympic title in China’s hands.
snippet: Li Jianrou of China won the 500-meter short-track speedskating gold in a wild final race. The victory kept the Olympic title in China’s hands.
